content.title: Surveys Sent
content.creator:
Neil Billings
March 7, 2025
content.content:
Hi Backers, surveys have now been sent. Please fill them in as as soon as possible. I will collect the surveys for the next week and send the files after that.
The survey asks what email address do you use for your DriveThruRPG or Wargame Vault account. Either will do as the sites are amalgamated.
Please answer with just the email address, any other words invalidates the address for when I send the rewards.
If you still need to make an account you can do so here:
 https://www.drivethrurpg.com/ 
 https://www.wargamevault.com/ 
all the best,
Neil

comments.text: Hi, i create a account on wargamevault.com. and so what is the next step ? Merci.
Hi Eldair, I will be sending the link to the files at the end of this week - I'm waiting for more people to have filled in the survey. Then you will be able to access the files through Wargame Vault.

content.title: All finished
content.creator:
Neil Billings
March 4, 2025
content.content:
Hi backers, the Ruins of Highspire Kickstarter has now finished and wow, it's been the best one yet for FoxCraft. I owe you all a big thanks for making it a success.
In a few days I'll send out the reward surveys. That will ask what email account you have associated with your Wargame Vault or Drive Thru RPG account (either will do, the sites are amalgamated). I'll then spend the next week or so collecting the surveys and will send out the rewards after that.
If you don't have an account with Wargame Vault or DriveThru-RPG you can make those here:
https://www.wargamevault.com/
https://www.drivethrurpg.com/
All the best and thanks again!
Neil
FoxCraft Creations

comments.text: Well done! I look forward to printing some terrain!
Thanks David, I'll be sending the survey today, so make sure you fill it in :)
Congrats! I've supported your work before, and probably will do so again. Keep up the great work!

content.title: Stretch Goals 2 and Stahl's Crypt
content.creator:
Neil Billings
February 27, 2025
content.content:
Hi backers, there are only a few days left of the Kickstarter campaign - so far it has been going really well! Thanks again for backing it.
Stretch Goals
Since my last update I've completed a few more stretch goals:
Stretch Goal 9, walkway X section
Stretch Goal 10, unruined tower
Stretch goal 11, alternate small tower
I still have a few  to make to catch up to the Kickstarter total so you can look forward to seeing a few more before we are done.
Stahl's Crypt
My brother has just launched a Kickstarter campaign featuring The Ultimate 3D Printable Crypt. Check it out:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/deviousgames/stahls-crypt
All the best,
Neil
FoxCraft Creations

comments.text: We were raised on a diet of Conan, Krull and Labyrinth (and lots of Star Wars) :)
Oh yeah, they were on repeat too!

content.title: competed stretch goals 1
content.creator:
Neil Billings
February 18, 2025
content.content:
Hi there, the Ruins of Highspire Kickstarter campaign is still in full swing and going well, thanks to you!
There have been quite a few stretch goals unlocked since the last update. Here are the ones I have finished, although a couple still need to be test printed so may need changes.
Firstly, due to my fdm printer having difficulty with a couple of the treasure chest designs, that stretch goal has been changed to include chests and barrels.
Here are the rest of the competed designs.
Doors
Walls
Wall corner
Walkway corner and wlakway floor tiles
walkway T section
Next on the agenda are some more walkway pieces and another small tower, as well as a complete, unruined version, of the large tower.
Okay, that's it for now.
Have a great day
Neil
FoxCraft Creations

content.title: Welcome to Highspire
content.creator:
Neil Billings
February 7, 2025
content.content:
Hi, welcome to the Ruins of Highspire Kickstarter campaign. This is the first in a series of ruins I plan on designing around the crumbling city of Highspire.
The campaign has started well and seven stretch goals have already been unlocked.
I have the first three stretch goals up on the kickstarter page but you can also see them here:
Stretch Goal 1, two stone columns
Stretch Goal 2, treasure chests
Stretch Goal 3, ruined tower base
I thought I had all three of there sets ready to go, but I've had some printing issues with the chests, so I'll be dropping the two with more ornate designs and replacing them with some barrels in various states of decay. I'll update the picture once that's done.
If we get to NZ$10,000 the rate of stretch goals will slow to one every two thousand dollars. 
Okay, I'll be back with more news as more things get unlocked and I finish up the designs.
Best wishes,
Neil
FoxCraft Creations
